name: Goofy Penguin
text: Whenever Goofy Penguin becomes the target of a spell or ability, you may tap or untap target permanent.

name: Cute Angel
{W}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Cute Angel this turn.
Flavor Text: "Even the heavens can't resist her charm."

name: Odd Emu
text: Whenever Odd Emu attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Flavor Text: "The emu's peculiar behavior is a mystery to many, but it always leads to hidden treasures."

name: Quirky Elf
text: Whenever Quirky Elf deals combat damage to a player, you may have target creature you control gain trample until end of turn.
Flavor Text: "Who needs a straight path when you can dance through the forest?"

name: Quirky Giant
text: Whenever Quirky Giant attacks, you may choose one of the following abilities at random:
Flavor Text: "You never know what you're going to get with this one. It's like a box of giant-sized surprises!"

name: Goofy Mermaid
text: Whenever Goofy Mermaid attacks, you may tap target creature defending player controls. If you do, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Flavor Text: "Who says mermaids can't have a sense of humor? Just watch out for their mischievous tricks!"

name: Bizarre Satyr
Flavor Text: "Madness is my muse, chaos my canvas."
Illustration: [An eccentric satyr with wild hair and a mischievous grin, holding a flaming torch in one hand and a handful of torn cards in the other.]

name: Strange Panda
text: Whenever Strange Panda deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Goofy Panda
flavor: "Who said pandas can't be playful? Goofy Panda is here to prove them wrong!"

name: Bizarre Elf
text: Whenever Bizarre Elf deals combat damage to a player, you may exile the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost until end of turn. If you don't, put it into your graveyard.
flavor: "In the realm of the strange and peculiar, the Bizarre Elf reigns supreme."

name: Bizarre Minotaur
text: Whenever Bizarre Minotaur attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
flavor text: "In the labyrinth of its mind, reality and illusion intertwine."

name: Strange Barbarian
text: Whenever Strange Barbarian attacks, you may exile the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
flavor: "His methods may be unconventional, but his results are undeniable."
